embeds.title: Lilase FAQ
embeds.description:
What is Lilase:
Lilase is a QOL Auction House Mod that is made to auto buy and sell items on the auction house for profit

What is Cofl why is it better to buy it:
Cofl is a QOL Auction House mod that tracks and find snipes for the user based on a provided config

Where can i get Cofl:
Their site -> https://sky.coflnet.com/flipper?refId=oedm8r

Where can I get Cofl Premium:
https://sky.coflnet.com/premium?refId=oedm8r

Where is showcase of cofl macro:
https://youtu.be/HqYhtSoDGBc

How to create webhooks:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fKksxz2Gdnc

Does Lilase have “skip” on the cofl macro:
Yes

What is Bed spam and Delay:
Bed spam & Delay is for auctions that just started that have the bed item in the gui to buy

The sniper isn't buying items/Listing them:
If the sniper isn't buying items make sure its actually on (Press end key/rebind in settings on mc), If the sniper isn't listing items make sure sniper only is off if that is off get your log and send it to night (Other sniper mods such as Void can cause issues in sniping make sure if your using lilase that its the only one in the mods folder)

Where can i get a Cofl config:
Godflipper: https://discord.gg/godflipper

Is there a paid version of Lilase:
No

Are donations accepted:
Yes donations are accepted, dm Night to donate

Can i suggest features to add:
Features can be suggested but make sure they aren't stuff that is already in there

I'm not getting webhook messages:
Make sure you setup the webhook correctly in the config if so send your log file to night and he can look into it

Will Lilase be able to macro other things in game:
At the moment no but that doesn't mean we wont test on other macros such as one for bazzar

What is required to run this:
Cofl and forge 1.8.9 + Latest lilase mod file from https://github.com/night0721/Lilase/releases/tag/latest

Is Lilase open source:
Yes lilase is open source the source is located on https://github.com/night0721/Lilase/releases/tag/latest

How to flip?:
Download the latest version of Lilase from https://github.com/night0721/Lilase/releases
Download latest version of cofl from https://github.com/Coflnet/SkyblockMod/releases/tag/1.5.2
Put it into %APPDATA%/.minecraft/mods
Start forge 1.8.9
Change any config you like by pressing N (Or any key you changed in settings)
save the file and press M key to start COFL sniper(or change it in settings)
For example configuration, see https://github.com/night0721/Lilase#example-config 

To get started with sending messages, you need a webhook URL, you can get one via the "Integrations" tab in your server's settings. If you're having issues creating a webhook, [the bot](https://discohook.app/bot) can help you create one for you.

Keep in mind that Discohook can't do automation yet, it only sends messages when you tell it to. If you are looking for an automatic feed or custom commands this isn't the right tool for you.
